info.title: DISCES API
info.description: A typical major requirement in a Smart City/Cloud environment consists of an engine for distributed task scheduling. In this context, DISIT lab developed an efficient solution for Smart management and scheduling, Distributed SCE Scheduler, DISCES. DISCES consists of a set of distributed instances of running agents performing concurrent tasks. DISCES engine with cluster functionality allows adding distributed nodes and defining jobs, without service downtime.

get.description:
The full list of the APIs that can be accessed via a HTTP GET request follows:
* **checkExistJob** 

  _Description:_ API to check the existence of a job on the scheduler. 
  
  _Input model:_ id_name_group_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output

* **checkExistTrigger**

  _Description:_ API to check the existence of a trigger on the scheduler.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **clear**

  _Description:_ API to delete all jobs and triggers on the scheduler.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_output
  
* **clearScheduler**

  _Description:_ alias of _clear_.
  
* **deleteCalendar**

  _Description:_ API to delete a calendar on the scheduler.
  
  _Input model:_ id_calendar_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output
  
* **deleteJob**

  _Description:_ API to delete a job from the scheduler, and all associated triggers.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **getCurrentlyExecutingJobs**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of running jobs.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
  
* **getTriggersOfJob**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of running jobs.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
  
* **getJobDetail**

  _Description:_ API to ask for job details.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
  
* **getJobGroupNames**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of groups.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output
  
* **getPausedTriggerGroups**
  
  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of paused triggers.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output
  
* **getSchedulerInstanceId**

  _Description:_ API to ask for the scheduler's instance id.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ string_output
  
* **getSchedulerName**

  _Description:_ API to ask for the scheduler's instance name.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ string_output
  
* **getTriggerGroupNames**
  
  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output
  
* **getTriggerKeys**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers in a group.
  
  _Input model:_ id_triggerGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ numbered_values_json_output

* **getTriggersOfJob**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers of a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ tabular_json_output
  
* **getTriggerState**

  _Description:_ API to request a trigger status.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ string_output
  
* **interruptJob**

  _Description:_ API to request the interruption of all instances of a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **interruptJobInstance**

  _Description:_ API to request the interruption of an instance of a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **interruptJobs**

  _Description:_ API to request the interruption of all running jobs.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **interruptFireInstanceId**

  _Description:_ API to request the interruption of an instance of a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_fire_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output

* **isInStandbyMode**

  _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is on standby.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **isShutdown**

  _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is shutdown.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **isStarted**

  _Description:_ API to ask if the scheduler is running.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **pauseTriggers**

  _Description:_ API to ask you to pause all triggers (including future triggers).
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **pauseJob**

  _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **pauseJobs**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a list of all triggers in a group.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output
  
* **pauseTrigger**

  _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a trigger.
  
  _Input model:_ id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **pauseTriggers**

  _Description:_ API to prompt you to pause a trigger.
  
  _Input model:_ id_groupName_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output
  
* **rescheduleJob**

  _Description:_ API for requesting job rescheduling.
  
  _Input model:_ id_wi_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **resumeAll**

  _Description:_ API to request resume of all jobs and triggers.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **resumeJob**

  _Description:_ API to request a job resume.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **resumeJobs**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a group's job resume.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **resumeTrigger**

  _Description:_ API to request a trigger resume.
  
  _Input model:_ id_triggerName_triggerGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **resumeTriggers**

  _Description:_ API to request resume of triggers of a group.
  
  _Input model:_ id_groupName_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output       
  
* **shutdownScheduler**

  _Description:_ API for requesting scheduler shutdowns.

  _Input model:_ id_wait4jobs2complete_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **standbyScheduler**

  _Description:_ API to request standby of the scheduler.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **startScheduler**

  _Description:_ API for requesting the scheduler start.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **startDelayed**

  _Description:_ API for requesting delayed scheduler start.
  
  _Input model:_ id_seconds_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output
  
* **truncateCatalinaLog**

  _Description:_ API to request for Catalina log truncate (Tomcat).
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **triggerJob**

  _Description:_ API to request for a job execution.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **unscheduleJob**

  _Description:_ API to request removal of a job from the scheduler.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **listJobTriggers**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a job trigger list.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ table_row_json_output
  
* **updateJobDataMap**

  _Description:_ API to ask for a job trigger list.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_jobDataMap_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **addJob**

  _Description:_ API to request to add a job to the scheduler.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_jobClass_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output

* **getNotificationEmail**

  _Description:_ API to ask for the notification email associated with the job completion.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **getJobDataMap**

  _Description:_ API to request for a job data map in JSON format.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
  
* **getJobFireTimes**

  _Description:_ API to request job firing times.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
  
* **getJobTriggers**

  _Description:_ API to request job triggers.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ tabular_json_output_essential
  
* **getSchedulerMetadata**

  _Description:_ API to request scheduler metadata.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
  
* **getSystemStatus**

  _Description:_ API to request the scheduler node status.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
  
* **getConnectionPoolInfo**

  _Description:_ API for requesting connection pool information for the database.
  
  _Input model:_ id_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ key_value_json_output
  
* **buildTriggerForJob**

  _Description:_ API to request the creation of a trigger for a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_jobName_jobGrp_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_json_output
  
* **setJobProgress**

  _Description:_ API to set the percentage progress of a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_fireid_progress_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ bool_html_output
  
* **getJobProgress**

  _Description:_ API to request the percentage progress of a job.
  
  _Input model:_ id_fireid_input_json
  
  _Output model:_ string_html_output

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: The parameter value is expected to be a serialized JSON object. Refer to the description of the API of your interest to know how your input should be shaped (_input model_). Reach the _Models_ section at the bottom of this page and explode the model of your interest to know more about it.

200.description: Different APIs provide different outputs. Refer to the description of the API of your interest to know how its output is shaped (output model).

waitForJobsToComplete.description: If true, the scheduler is shutdown when jobs are completed, otherwise it will be shutdown immediately.

id.description: The id of the required action. Find it in bold in the listing of the exposed APIs.

withIdentityNameGroup.description: The job and group names separated by a dot (.)

string_output.description: Typically returned by those APIs that are expected to provide the identifier, name, or status of one entity.

1.description: Serialization of a JSON that aims to represent a set of numbered rows through arrays of unlabeled values (positional semantic).

0.example: ["Trigger Name","Trigger Group","Calendar Name","Description","End Time","Final Fire Time","Misfire Instruction","Next Fire Time","Previous Fire Time","Priority","Start Time","May Fire Again"]

table_row_json_output.example: {"0":["Trigger Name","Trigger Group","Calendar Name","Description","End Time","Final Fire Time","Misfire Instruction","Next Fire Time","Previous Fire Time","Priority","Start Time","May Fire Again"],"1":["7e369086-851f-4191-927f-229327d0f44c","4b2cf714-cd6c-4265-8b2e-702a80150736","","","","","0","Thu Mar 17 12:00:00 CET 2016","Thu Mar 17 06:00:00 CET 2016","5","Thu Dec 10 12:00:00 CET 2015","true"]}

externalDocs.description: DISCES: DISTRIBUTED SCE SCHEDULER TOOLS (SCE: SMART CITY/CLOUD ENGINE), A DISIT TOOL FOR SMART ENVIRONMENTS
